events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

Dust billows around your ship as it touches down at the coordinates provided by Jarrod. The factory is brightly lit, and the metallic noises coming from the flat, stretched-out building signal that the production within is well underway. 

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

eventActions.tbText: The dust clears to reveal a swarm of freshly produced X-8 blaster droids guarding the factory. Your unwelcome appearance has conveniently provided the perfect opportunity to test their new weapons. You can’t let them stand between you and the schematics.

{-} Imperial mission tokens represent X-8 blaster droids. X-8 blaster droids are Imperial figures (Health: Threat Level, Defense: 1 {G}, Attack: {O}, 1 blue die, +1 {H}).
{-} The mission will progress when the Rebels enter the Factory.

eventActions.bonuses:
ELECTRIC SHOCK: After this figure attacks, each Rebel figure adjacent to an X-8 blaster droid suffers 1 {C}.
FIND WEAKNESS: The attack of this figure gains Pierce 1.
eventActions.abilities: HEALTH: The X-8 blaster droid has *1* Health.
eventActions.customText:
{-} The attack gains +1 {H}.
{Q} Move 3 to attack the Rebel adjacent to the most X8 blaster droids. Apply +1 {H} for each X8 blaster droid adjacent to the defender except for the attacker.
{A} Move 2 toward the Rebel adjacent to the most X8 blaster droids.
{A} Move 4 toward the Rebel adjacent to the most X8 blaster droids.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Imperial mission tokens represent X-8 blaster droids. X-8 blaster droids are Imperial figures (Health: Threat Level, Defense: 1 {G}, Attack: {O}, 1 blue die, +1 {H}).
{-} The mission will progress when the Rebels enter the Factory.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
As the last control panel crackles and smokes, Jarrod looks up from a console and grins. “I took the original plans and left a corrupted copy. Anyone trying to manufacture more of these will be in for a surprise...”

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Jarrod Kelvin receives the “X-8 Upgrade” Reward card.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

As you scramble back aboard your ship, a dejected Jarrod slams his fist against | the hull. "Once again I have failed my master," he laments, "and now his genius will be used against us all."

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
The noise increases in volume as you pry open the door. Guards and droids ready their weapons as you storm in.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: The door leads into the factory.

eventActions.tbText:
Countless conveyor belts and heavy machinery are churning out more X-8 blaster droids.

{-} A hero can interact with the terminal ({I}) to try and download the schematics.
{-} The mission will progress when the schematics have been downloaded.

events.eventText: Finally! Your datapad chimes to signal that the download has finished. The schematics are yours. Now to stop the factory from producing a droid ever again.

eventActions.bonuses:

{A} Move 4 toward the Rebel adjacent to the most X8 blaster droids.

eventActions.tbText:
Now that you have downloaded the schematics, you turn your attention towards the terminals.

{-} Rebel figures can attack a terminal (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}) or interact with a terminal ({K} or {I}) to destroy it.
{-} After the red terminals are destroyed, no more blaster droids are being produced.
{-} The Rebels win when all terminals and all X-8 blaster droids are destroyed.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The design terminal still contains the schematics for the X-8 blaster droids.

{-} Rebel figures can attack a terminal (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}) or interact with a terminal ({K} or {I}) to destroy it.

The control terminals manage the droid production.

{-} Rebel figures can attack a terminal (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}) or interact with a terminal ({K} or {I}) to destroy it.

The control terminals manage the droid production.

{-} Rebel figures can attack a terminal (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}) or interact with a terminal ({K} or {I}) to destroy it.

eventActions.shortText: Shut down production by destroying the terminals.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Imperial mission tokens represent X-8 blaster droids. X-8 blaster droids are Imperial figures (Health: Threat Level, Defense: 1 {G}, Attack: {O}, 1 blue die, +1 {H}).
{-} Rebel figures can attack a terminal (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}) or interact with a terminal ({K} or {I}) to destroy it.
{-} After the red terminals are destroyed, no more blaster droids are being produced.
{-} The Rebels win when all terminals and all X-8 blaster droids are destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.mainText:
You try to slice into the schematics terminal.

{-} Test {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the terminal, then discard all strain tokens on the terminal. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText: You don't make any progress. You need to keep trying.

events.eventText: The terminal’s screens flicker one last time and then go dark forever.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: The control terminals manage the droid production.

events.eventText: Now that the terminals are useless, all you need to do is turn the remaining X-8 prototypes into scrap.
